## DrawPolygonTool class

绘制多边形

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DrawPolygonTool<O extends DrawPolygonToolOptions = DrawPolygonToolOptions, E extends DrawBaseEvents = DrawPolygonToolEvents> extends DrawPolylineTool<O, E>
```

**Extends:** [DrawPolylineTool](./cesium.drawpolylinetool)<!-- -->&lt;O, E&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new DrawPolygonTool(options)

tool.enable()

tool.eventBus.on('left-click', onLeftClick)
tool.eventBus.on('mouse-move', onMouseMove)
tool.eventBus.on('right-click', onRightClick)
tool.eventBus.on('left-dbclick', onLeftDBClick)
```

## Methods

| Method                                                             | Modifiers              | Description                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| [clear()](./cesium.drawpolygontool.clear)                       |                        | 清空绘制结果，等待下轮绘制                 |
| [clearFloat()](./cesium.drawpolygontool.clearfloat)             | <code>protected</code> | 清除浮动实体                               |
| [createArea(positions)](./cesium.drawpolygontool.createarea)    | <code>protected</code> | 创建面                                     |
| [createLFloatArea()](./cesium.drawpolygontool.createlfloatarea) | <code>protected</code> | 创建拖拽面                                 |
| [destroy()](./cesium.drawpolygontool.destroy)                   |                        | 销毁                                       |
| [enable()](./cesium.drawpolygontool.enable)                     |                        | 启用                                       |
| [stop()](./cesium.drawpolygontool.stop)                         |                        | 传递本轮绘制结果，不再绘制，不清空绘制结果 |
| [validateArea()](./cesium.drawpolygontool.validatearea)         | <code>protected</code> | 校验多边形                                 |
